issue.title: [C++] Compact generated code in compute/kernels/scalar_set_lookup.cc using same method as vector_hash.cc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9250](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9250). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This module can be made to compile smaller and faster by using common kernels for types having the same binary representation

comments.body:
